column1:
The overall sentiment percentages are as follows:

Overall Cleaniness: 59.19%
Overall Amenities: 65.71%
Overall Location: 60.32%
Overall Services: 64.3%
Overall General: 65.68%
Overall Value: 57.2%

To improve in each aspect: 

Cleaniness - Improve sanitation measures, increase availability of cleaning supplies, and encourage customers to practice proper hygiene.

Amenities - Increase the variety and quality of amenities offered by the establishment.

Location - Upgrade the location's accessibility to attract more customers. Promote the location and increase its visibility.

Services - Create an effective customer service to ensure customer satisfaction. Focus on creating a positive customer service experience.

General - Create a positive atmosphere in the establishment and ensure customer satisfaction. Encourage customers to provide feedback for further improvement.

Value - Increase value by providing competitive prices. Offer discounts and promotions to attract customers.
